Description.name: Description0
Description.content: VFS URI of the JSP that renders the XHTML that is translated to PDF.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: VFS URI of the XML content that should be rendered. Here its the VFS URI of the content that's rendered by the formatter.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The locale in which the content should be accessed. If not given, the locale from the request context is used.
